main_definition: The Phillips is a well-known brand of power tools, or it can be used as a surname, indicating an individual's family name.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A popular brand of power tools and home appliances
meanings_and_examples.example: I bought a Phillips head screwdriver to assemble my new furniture.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Surname indicating family origin or affiliation
meanings_and_examples.example: My grandfather, John Phillips, was an engineer in the 1950s.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A mathematical model known as Phillips Curve that describes the inverse relationship between inflation and unemployment rate.
meanings_and_examples.example: The economist explained how changes in unemployment could affect inflation, referencing the Phillips curve theory.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An abbreviation for a type of screw head used by this brand
meanings_and_examples.example: I need to buy a new drill bit that fits my Philips head power tool.
